meanings.definition: The quality or style of being characteristic of a preppy.
meanings.sent1: Her preppiness shone through in her pastel-colored outfits.
meanings.sent2: The school's dress code emphasized preppiness with collared shirts and khaki pants.
meanings.sent3: Even her pet dog seemed to exude preppiness with its tiny bowtie.
meanings.sent4: The preppiness of the country club was evident in its pristine tennis courts and elegant decor.
meanings.sent5: The preppiness of the yacht club made her feel out of place in her casual attire.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of embodying preppy fashion or behavior.
meanings.sent1: His preppiness was evident in his love for boat shoes and polo shirts.
meanings.sent2: She embraced preppiness by always carrying a tote bag and wearing pearls.
meanings.sent3: The preppiness of the party was undeniable with its nautical theme and cucumber sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: The preppiness of the neighborhood was like stepping into a J.Crew catalog.
meanings.sent5: His preppiness stood out in a sea of casual attire at the beach bonfire.
